elements: Water Flowing lifeblood of the world, master of adaptation and change.
Air Invisible force of life, carrier of whispers and secrets.
Ether The cosmic force, bridge between the physical and spiritual realms.
Life Sacred breath of existence, master of growth and healing.
Space Vast canvas of existence, the silent holder of celestial bodies.
Coral Sea's precious gift, symbol of life and beauty in diversity.
Pearl Lustrous gem of the ocean, symbol of rarity and purity.
Aquamarine Stone of the sea, keeper of calming energies, and bringer of peace.
